pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū varaseyyāyo palibundhenti, therā bhikkhū vuṭṭhāpenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:1.4: “kena nu kho mayaṃ upāyena idheva vassaṃ vaseyyāmā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:1.5: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū there bhikkhū anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:1.8: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū there bhikkhū anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:1.9: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:1.10: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, there bhikkhū anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:1.13: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, there bhikkhū anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:1.15: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:1.16: “Yo pana bhikkhu saṃghike vihāre jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappeyya— yassa sambādho bhavissati so pakkamissatī’ti, etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:2.1.8: vuḍḍhoti jānāti, gilānoti jānāti, saṃghena dinnoti jānāti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:2.1.12: mañcassa vā pīṭhassa vā pavisantassa vā nikkhamantassa vā upacāre seyyaṃ santharati vā santharāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:2.1.13: Abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:2.1.15: na añño koci paccayo hoti anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappetuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:2.2.1: Saṃghike saṃghikasaññī anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:2.2.2: Saṃghike vematiko anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:2.2.3: Saṃghike puggalikasaññī anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:2.2.4: Mañcassa vā pīṭhassa vā pavisantassa vā nikkhamantassa vā upacāraṃ ṭhapetvā seyyaṃ santharati vā santharāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:2.2.5: Abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:2.2.6: Vihārassa upacāre vā upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ vā maṇḍape vā rukkhamūle vā ajjhokāse vā seyyaṃ santharati vā santharāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:2.2.7: Abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:2.2.10: Puggalike puggalikasaññī aññassa puggalike āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc16:2.3.3: sītena vā uṇhena vā pīḷito pavisati,
